title: Consult a Technical Manual for a Repair
description: A technician is working on an unfamiliar piece of equipment and needs to access its technical service manual.

tasks.description: Identify the asset tag or model number of the equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the specific equipment being worked on.

tasks.description: Search the technical document library for the corresponding service manual.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds and opens the PDF of the service manual.

tasks.description: Navigate to the troubleshooting section for 'motor faults' to find repair instructions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locates the relevant section of the manual to guide their repair.
